{{ letter_head }}
SALARY CERTIFICATE

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") if doc.posting_date else '' }}

To Whom It May Concern

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name or '' }} (Iqama No: {{ doc.iqama_number or '' }}) who is the holder of {{ doc.nationality or 'Indian' }} Passport - {{ doc.passport_no or 'P000000' }}, has been working with {{ doc.company_name or 'Hydrotech Trading Company' }}, in the capacity of {{ doc.designation or 'Designation' }}, since {% set month_names = ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'] %} {{ month_names[frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.from_date, "MM")|int - 1] }} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.from_date, "yyyy") if doc.from_date else '2024' }}.

He is drawing a total remuneration of {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.amount) if doc.amount else '' }} ( {{ doc.amount_in_words or 'Ten Thousand Saudi Riyals' }} ) only as gross amount.

This salary certificate is being issued to Mr. {{ doc.employee_name or '' }} upon his personal request without any financial liability to our company.

For {{ doc.company_name or 'Hydrotech Trading Company' }},

{% set seal_image = frappe.db.get_value('Salary Seal', {'company': doc.company}, 'seal_image') %} {% if seal_image %} {% else %}

( Company Seal to be attached )

{% endif %}


{{ doc.admin_name or 'Mr. Zakaria Al Kuwaity' }}
{{ doc.admin_designation or 'Admin Manager' }}

{{ footer }}
